thread.title: Scott Disick admits he's a sex addict after furious Kim Kardashian discovers he invited date to family holiday
thread.title_full: Scott Disick admits he's a sex addict after furious Kim Kardashian discovers he invited date to family holiday

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Scott Disick admits he's a sex addict after furious Kim Kardashian discovers he invited date to family holiday
text:
Scott Disick admits he's a sex addict after furious Kim Kardashian discovers he invited date to family holiday The opening episode of the new series of Keeping Up With The Kardashians promises to be explosive Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Scott Disick Breaks Down over Kourtney Kardashian: 'I'm a Sex Addict!' Share this video Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing! Could   
Scott Disick hit the headlines early last month when he bailed on the family trip to Costa Rica early - and now fans can see the fall out for themselves. 
In explosive scenes filmed for the latest series of Keeping Up With The Kardshians, due to air this weekend, Scott admits he's a sex addict after being blasted by the Kardashians for bringing another girl to the getaway. 
The new trailer shows Scott declaring that Kourtney is "the love of my life,” as he cosies up to the mother of his kids, but Kourtney reveals she doesn't see a future with Scott. Scott fires back at Kim (Photo: E!) (Photo: E!) Scott says Kourt is the love of his life - but she's not convinced (Photo: E!) (Photo: E!) 
“It’s never going to work out," she admits. 
And just minutes later he's caught with another woman. Pictured: Scott Disick's mystery Costa Rica girl Bella Banos (Photo: Instagram/Bella Banos) The Lord was later seen cosying up to two models in Miami (Photo: FameFlynet) Read More 
A furious Kim tells Scott he's a "f**king whore" when she discovers the 33-year-old invited the model to stay with him during their break. 
Firing back, a tearful Scott holds his hands up as he yells he's a "sex addict". Scott Disick arrives at Catch restaurant to celebrate Kendall Jenner's 21st birthday in West Hollywood. (Photo: Splash News) Kourtney says she doesn't see a future with Scott (Photo: Splash News) Read More 
Elsewhere, Kim breaks down as she recalls the Paris robbery ordeal, and also talks about husband Kanye West's well-publicised problems. 
“If the elevator does not open in time, I’m f**ked,” she tearfully tells her sisters. 
“Everything has changed, but we can’t be afraid,” Khloe adds in the trailer. “We can’t let people scare us into not living our lives.” Like us on Facebook
